tweet.text: In a Jan. 18, 1991, telephone conversation, Gorbachev and Bush discussed efforts to end Saddam Hussein’s occupation of Kuwait, an example of U.S.-Soviet cooperation during the Gulf War: https://t.co/xHaXFHanIn https://t.co/qHT64rFgsg
